fields.helpSection: Navigate to the System page, and select MANAGE USERS -> Click New User and select Service User. Enter a name for the user. Leave the status as 'Active'. Click FINISH to receive the Token window -> Copy the values of Access Key and Secret Key, for use in the Escher authentication.

Navigate to the System page, and select MANAGE USERS -> Click New User and select Service User. Enter a name for the user. Leave the status as 'Active'. Click FINISH to receive the Token window -> Copy the values of Access Key and Secret Key, for use in the Escher authentication.
